<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-8c8c-43b1-21aa-8248d84e5e7a#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gemma Augustea ónixkámea.</string>
            <string language="en">Gemma Augustea onyx cameo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gemma Augustea onyx Miniatur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Camée d'onyx de Gemma Augustea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cameo do onyx de Augustea da gema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cameo del onyx di Augustea del gemma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμέα Augustea Gemma onyx</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Camafeo del onyx de Augustea del brote</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fekete ónix, fehé telérből kicsiszolt két szalagba rendezett jelenettel.</string>
            <string language="en">black onyx with a scene sorted in two bands and  polished of white vein</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Kr.e. 1. század,  kámea,  Római Birodalom,  ónix,  féldrágakő,  csiszolás,  faragás,  Augustus,  Tiberius,  Gemma Augustea ónixkámea,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, 1st century BC, cameo, Roman Empire, onyx, semi-precious stone, polishing, carving, Augustus, Tiberius, Gemma Augustea, onyx cameo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwarzes onyx mit einer Szene, die in zwei 
Bändern sortiert wurde und polierte von der weißen Ader</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'onyx noir avec une scène triée dans deux 
bandes et a poli de la veine blanche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o onyx preto com uma cena classificada em duas 
faixas e lustrou da veia branca</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il onyx nero con una scena ordinata in due fasce ed
ha lucidato della vena bianca</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαύρο onyx με μια σκηνή που ταξινομείται σε δύο 
ζώνες και που γυαλίζεται της άσπρης φλέβας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el onyx negro con una escena clasificada en dos 
vendas y pulió de la vena blanca</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, 1. Jahrhundert BC, Miniatur, 
römisches Reich, onyx, Halbedelstein, Polieren, schnitzend, Augustus,
Tiberius, Gemma Augustea, onyx Miniatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, 1er siècle BC, camée, empire 
romain, onyx, pierre de semi-finale-precious, polissage, découpant, 
Augustus, Tiberius, Gemma Augustea, camée d'onyx</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, 1o século BC, cameo, império 
roman, onyx, pedra semi-precious, lustrar, carving, Augustus, 
Tiberius, gema Augustea, cameo do onyx</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, primo secolo BC, cameo, impero romano, 
onyx, pietra semi-precious, lucidare, intagliante, Augustus, Tiberius,
gemma Augustea, cameo del onyx</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, 1$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., καμέα, ρωμαϊκή 
αυτοκρατορία, onyx, ημιπολύτιμη πέτρα, στίλβωση, χάραξη, 
Augustus, Tiberius, Gemma Augustea, onyx καμέα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, 1r siglo A.C., camafeo, imperio 
romano, onyx, piedra semipreciosa, el pulir, tallando, Augustus, 
Tiberius, brote Augustea, camafeo del onyx</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

    </metadata>
